title: Topic 003 Question 055
body: You have a Power BI report that contains one page. The page contains two line charts and one bar chart.
You need to ensure that users can perform the following tasks for all three visuals:
•	Switch the measures used in the visuals.
The solution must minimize development effort.
options: Create a bookmark for each acceptable combination of visualization type, measure, and legend in the bar chart.
Edit the interactions between the three visuals.
